processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value

advice.text: Re-read the task: you must read one integer and output the sum of all its divisors.
Make sure your top-level steps cover input, iterating candidates, checking divisibility, accumulating, and printing.
Refine the 'Loop' comment into sub-comments: loop index from 1 to n, check if the index divides n, add it to sum when it does, then print the sum.
